usage: Requests must be signed with a Basic Auth token

/api/artifacts.POST: Authenticated clients who are registered on-chain as **archaeologists** can create new artifacts, storing them on-chain

/api/artifacts/:id.GET: All on-chain data for the artifact with uid <id>

/api/artifacts/:id/relocate.PUT: Authenticated clients who are registered on-chain as **owners** of the artifact with uid <id> can update the location data associated with that artifact

/api/archaeologists.GET: List of addresses belonging to on-chain **archaeologists**
/api/archaeologists.POST: Authenticated clients who are registered on-chain as **delegates** can register an archaeologist on-chain by providing their address

/api/archaeologists/:id.GET: Address of an **archaeologist** registered on-chain with uid <id>

/api/accounts.GET: Map of users to the addresses they control
